pr_title: Add length_limit type options to keyword field mappers.

timeline.message: Add length_limit type options to text and keyword field mappers.

timeline.bodyText: We could also keep it as primitive int with Integer.MAX_VALUE for the case that is represented as null now.
timeline.author: kovrus

timeline.message: Add length_limit type options to text and keyword field mappers.

timeline.author: mfussenegger

timeline.bodyText: Is it necessary to have this property also on the TextFieldMapper ? Given that VARCHAR(lengthLimit) is mostly introduced for compatibility with SQL/PostgreSQL I think supporting it also for analyzed columns is not really necessary. If somebody adds an analyzer to a column, then it's already CrateDB dialect specific.
timeline.author: mfussenegger

replies.bodyText: didn't even think about it :(  shall we then forbid declaration of the length limit on analyzed columns in the crate analyzer?
replies.author: kovrus

replies.bodyText:
Probably makes sense.
One other thing about analyzed columns is that they're tokenized, so whether the length would apply to the individual tokens or the raw input would also be a bit vague.
replies.author: mfussenegger
